data.title: Ayn Rand, Homosexuality, and Human Liberation (Unsigned) by Sciabarra, Chris Matthew: Very Good Soft cover (2003) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780958457330 - 1st Edition - Soft cover - Leap Publishing CC, Cape Town, South Africa - 2003 - Condition: Very Good - Offered is a first edition, first (and only) printing of "Ayn Rand, Homosexuality, and Human Liberation" written by Chris Matthew Sciabarra and published in 2003 by Leap Publishing CC out of Cape Town, South Africa. Issued in soft cover only, measuring 5-7/8" by 8-1/4" and containing 76 pages including front and rear covers. With a two-page Foreword by Lindsay Perigo (Editor of 'The Free Radical' and Founder of SOLO - Sense-of-Life Objectivists), the Contents are: Preface; Introduction; Ayn Rand on Homosexuality; Post-Randians on Homosexuality; The Horror File; The Times They Are A Changin'; Male Bonding in the Randian Novel; Reconsidering Ayn Rand's Views on Homosexuality; Toward a New Model for Gay - and Human - Liberation; References. Outer covers show light edge and corner wear in places, small corner crease, light vertical bend. - Ayn Rand, Homosexuality, and Human Liberation (Unsigned)
data.text:
About this Item

Offered is a first edition, first (and only) printing of "Ayn Rand, Homosexuality, and Human Liberation" written by Chris Matthew Sciabarra and published in 2003 by Leap Publishing CC out of Cape Town, South Africa. Issued in soft cover only, measuring 5-7/8" by 8-1/4" and containing 76 pages including front and rear covers. With a two-page Foreword by Lindsay Perigo (Editor of 'The Free Radical' and Founder of SOLO - Sense-of-Life Objectivists), the Contents are: Preface; Introduction; Ayn Rand on Homosexuality; Post-Randians on Homosexuality; The Horror File; The Times They Are A Changin'; Male Bonding in the Randian Novel; Reconsidering Ayn Rand's Views on Homosexuality; Toward a New Model for Gay - and Human - Liberation; References. Outer covers show light edge and corner wear in places, small corner crease, light vertical bend. Seller Inventory # 014999

Contact seller
